attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reduce Child Support.
Tax payers should not be asked to pay to support the families of people who have more than two children.
If you want more children that is your choice but don't ask other people to pay for them.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
